name: blackvoid
title: Black Void (Unofficial)
description: An unofficial conversion of the dark and esoteric fantasy setting where human subsistence is in peril, as an eldritch cataclysm has exiled mankind from its homeworld, Earth. The Black Void RPG introduces action, adventure, intrigue and horror, as you and your fellow players seek to claim your rightful place in a vast and unfamiliar Cosmos or seek enlightenment in the mysterious Void filled with wonder, delight and dread. To support the creators, you can buy the core rulebook at https://www.modiphius.net/collections/black-void/products/black-void-core-book
author: Corndog
